mapper.select: select s.id, s.sn, s.name, s.address, s.description, s.created_at, s.updated_at, w.id as workTimeId, w.sn as workTimeSn, w.name as workTimeName, w.work_days as workTimeWorkDays, w.started_at as workTimeStartedAt, w.ended_at as workTimeEndedAt, p.id as dictionaryId, p.code as dictionaryCode, p.name as dictionaryName, p.level as dictionaryLevel, p.level_name as dictionaryLevelName, p.state as dictionaryState, p.type as dictionaryType, d.id as departmentId, d.name as departmentName, d.sn as departmentSn, d.description as departmentDescription from sites s left join work_times w on s.work_time_id=w.id left join process_dictionaries p on s.process_dictionary_id=p.id left join site_depts sd on s.id = sd.site_id left join departments d on sd.dept_id = d.id where s.sn=#{sn}

select s.id, s.sn, s.name, s.address, s.description, s.created_at, s.updated_at, w.id as workTimeId, w.sn as workTimeSn, w.name as workTimeName, w.work_days as workTimeWorkDays, w.started_at as workTimeStartedAt, w.ended_at as workTimeEndedAt, p.id as dictionaryId, p.code as dictionaryCode, p.name as dictionaryName, p.level as dictionaryLevel, p.level_name as dictionaryLevelName, p.state as dictionaryState, p.type as dictionaryType, d.id as departmentId, d.name as departmentName, d.sn as departmentSn, d.description as departmentDescription from sites s left join work_times w on s.work_time_id=w.id left join process_dictionaries p on s.process_dictionary_id=p.id left join site_depts sd on s.id = sd.site_id left join departments d on sd.dept_id = d.id order by ${sort} ${dir} limit #{offset}, #{size}

select s.id, s.sn, s.name, s.address, s.description, s.created_at, s.updated_at, w.id as workTimeId, w.sn as workTimeSn, w.name as workTimeName, w.work_days as workTimeWorkDays, w.started_at as workTimeStartedAt, w.ended_at as workTimeEndedAt, p.id as dictionaryId, p.code as dictionaryCode, p.name as dictionaryName, p.level as dictionaryLevel, p.level_name as dictionaryLevelName, p.state as dictionaryState, p.type as dictionaryType, d.id as departmentId, d.name as departmentName, d.sn as departmentSn, d.description as departmentDescription from sites s left join work_times w on s.work_time_id=w.id left join process_dictionaries p on s.process_dictionary_id=p.id left join site_depts sd on s.id = sd.site_id left join departments d on sd.dept_id = d.id where s.name like #{keyword} or s.sn like #{keyword} order by ${sort} ${dir} limit #{offset}, #{size}
